titleStmt.title: Nugæ venales, or, Complaisant companion being new jests, domestick and forreign, bulls, rhodomontados, pleasant novels and miscellanies.
titleStmt.author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected, with many new additions.

notesStmt.note: In ms. on fly leaf: "By Richard Head."
Imperfect: pages creased with print show-through and some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
